text: "Last Thing on My Mind" is the third and final single released from Irish singer/songwriter Ronan Keating's third studio album, Turn It On. It was also included on LeAnn Rimes' Greatest Hits album as well as her Best of album. The song was released in April 2004, peaking at number 5 on the UK Singles Chart. In the US, it was not officially released to country radio, although the music video received heavy rotation on the VH1 Country channel. It did become an adult contemporary hit, however, reaching number 16 on the Billboard Adult Contemporary chart. Elsewhere, the song reached the top 40 in Austria, Denmark, and Ireland. ==Track listing== CD single # "Last Thing on My Mind" - 3:56 # "Last Thing on My Mind" (Metro Mix) - 3:37 # "Last Thing on My Mind" (Mo Monkey Mix) - 4:43 # "Last Thing on My Mind" (Video) - 3:56 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !Chart (2004) !Peak position |- |- |- !scope="row"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |align="center"|17 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 singles Category:Ronan Keating songs Category:LeAnn Rimes songs Category:Songs written by Steve Robson Category:Songs written by Ronan Keating Category:2003 songs Category:Polydor Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by Steve Robson
